name: Equipment Spares
overview:
Established in the year 1952, we, “Equipment Spares Co.”, are among the reputed organizations, engaged in trading, importing and supplying a full range of Spares of equipment such as Dumpers, Pilling Rigs, Micro Tunneling Machines, Tunnel Boaring Machines, Wheel Loaders, Generator Sets, Dozers, Dragline, Showels, Drills, Pay Loaders, Graders, Water Sprinklers, Excavators, Cranes, Tyre Handlers.

Business Associates: To offer our customers a qualitative range of Diesel Engines, Hydraulic Excavators, Cranes and Allied Spare Parts, we have associated our selves with the renowned name of market. Our reliable business associates enables us to meet the requirements and expectation so the customers. These associates are widely known in the market for manufacturing a qualitative range of products. Voltas Omega Grove American Hoist Manitowoc P & H PPM Terex “C” Cranes

Company: We have done satisfactory jobs for various organization and naming few of them such as ONGC, DEMPOS, HPCL, TIMBLOS, VRM, INDIAN AIRLINES, CEMINIDIA, (now SKANSKA), ABG, and NOTHERN COALFIELD LTD and where the original principals of various original equipment manufacturers were stationed and what they were not able to do, we have done on their equipment, which equipments are the biggest in the world.

Products & Services: Earthmoving & Mining Machine Spares Construction & Infrastructure Machine Spare Parts Diesel Engine Spares Repairing Services Airline Equipment Spares
